title: Username
body: Is it possible for my to change my login username, because I changed my Summoner Name and I would like them to be the same thing so its easier for me to remember after breaks from playing :D

replies.body: We can't change usernames due to how they are tied to your account, but you should be able to have the client save that username for you so that you don't need to type it in each time.
